name: BomberMAN (itch) (MoshiPoshi)
description:
Hello guys!! i'm back again with a new project  which is the popular game BomberMan so i remade it with a simple touch of mine, so i hope you like it, for now it's just a local 2players game that u can play with your friend or with ur family member etc.. 
1 Player :
Moves : A D S W   place bomb with : SPACE
2 Player:
Moves : ARROWS place bomb with : Right Shift 
i'm considering the idea of making this game an online multiplayer game that you can play online with your friends up to 4players, but that really need some work and i'll work on that as soon as i can 
I would really appreciate your help if you can donate me some tips that would really motivates me to finish the project as fast as i can 
THANK YOU , ENJOOYY <3
